About the Club
Welcome to ChampionsGate Country Club
A Premier Semi-Private Country Club in Central Florida
Using the beautiful elevation changes and contours of the natural landscape, George Clifton has created a Central Florida golf gem. Our 18-hole masterpiece is a combination of beauty and playability. With expansive bunkers and true greens, the golfing experience is truly one of a kind.
Laid out through the stunning ChampionsGate Country Club community, our golf course is enhanced by natural habitat, exquisite ponds with gorgeous fountains and a scenic yet challenging bunker layout. The club features a six tee system that can accommodate golfers of all levels. The professional tees measure an impressive 7,071 yards and boast a rating of 74.4 and a slope of 135. The forward tees are a very accommodating 4,968 yards with a rating of 64.8 and a rating of 111.
